import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { FiChevronRight, FiChevronLeft } from 'react-icons/fi' import { FaQuoteRight } from 'react-icons/fa' import data from './data' function App() { const [people, setPeople] = useState(data) const [index, setIndex] = React.useState(0) return (

/reviews

{people.map((person, personIndex) => { const { id, image, name, title, quote } = person return (

{name}

{title}

{quote}

) })}
) } export default App
